body:
Reported by muaddib on the forum

Screenshots @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&start=255#p107274 On second screenshot card on my hand (cost: 1 black black) - destroy target creature (I can't remember card name), I try destroy Living Wall because I see no opponent land to regenerate.
On first screenshot we see opponent regenerate Living wall.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Living wall may regenerate without mana

comments.body:
Likely Living Wall was regenerated earlier and still had the regeneration effect on it.

**Status:** CantReproduce
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
